title: SGC 40 T205 McLean for sale ($35 shipped).
author: cdn_collector

posts.post_title: SGC 40 T205 McLean for sale ($35 shipped).
posts.post_content:
Evening Folks,

   It's time to clear out some stuff to further focus on my C46 venture.

All 6 T206s are gone, so just the McLean remains.  Price includes shipping.

T205 McLean (SGC 40): $35

Scans can be seen here:


McLean scans:
[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/ForTrade_Fronts.gif[/IMG]
[IMG]http://www.richardarmstrong.ca/ForTrade_Backs.gif[/IMG]

If you're interested, please email me at [url]richard@richardarmstrong.ca[/url]

Thanks for looking!

Richard.

posts.post_title: Kelley sold; 4 more for sale individually.
posts.post_content: Joe Kelley has been sold.  Remaining four cards have been priced individually.  Email if you are interested.

posts.post_title: Two more added: SGC graded T206 Congalton and T205 McLean
posts.post_content:
Couple more cards added to the list...email me or post here if you're interested.

Regards,

Richard.

Email received and replied to.

The remaining 4 T206s are yours.

Anyone wanna snag the T205 McLean so I can ship this stuff in 1 trip to the PO?!

Regards,

Richard.
